title: Senate official keeps trimming Trump's 'big, beautiful bill'
shortDescription: The Senate parliamentarian has ruled numerous aspects of President Donald Trump’s priority bill don't comply with special rules.

title: Supreme Court upholds Texas' age verification law for porn sites
shortDescription: Eighteen other states have enacted similar laws in recent years as access to online pornography has exploded and the material has become more graphic.

title: Trump 'daddy' merch for sale after NATO leader's viral comment
shortDescription: NATO Sec. Gen. Mark Rutte said "daddy has to sometimes use strong language." He was talking about the US, but MAGA has created Trump shirts with it.

title: In win for Trump, Supreme Court limits ways courts can block his policies
shortDescription: President Trump argued judges don't have the power to entirely block his executive orders as they're being challenged in court.

title: Supreme Court hands Trump temporary win on birthright citizenship: Live
shortDescription: The court ruled 6-3 that district court orders temporarily blocking Trump’s order "likely exceed" their authority.

title: Legendary PBS journalist Bill Moyers dead at 91
shortDescription: Bill Moyers, the PBS journalist and former White House press secretary, passed away in New York City at 91, following a long illness.

title: Hitting snags, Trump pushes Senate to pass big tax bill before July 4
shortDescription: With tensions in the Middle East abating and his tax bill teetering, Trump is turning his attention to legislation he’s nicknamed the Big Beautiful Bill

title: Who is the Senate parliamentarian?
shortDescription: GOP lawmakers are calling for Senate Parliamentarian Elizabeth MacDonough’s removal after she ruled against Medicaid changes in Trump’s spending bill.

title: Trump touts 'Big, Beautiful Bill' at WH event
shortDescription: President Donald Trump touted the "Big, Beautiful Bill" at a White House event, urging lawmakers to pass the legislation.

title: Trump approval rating: New poll released after US strikes on Iran
shortDescription: A pair of polls released this week offers an early look at how Iran strikes could affect Trump's job approval numbers.

title: A year ago: The Biden-Trump debate that changed the election
shortDescription: President Donald Trump debated now former President Joe Biden on June 27, 2024. Biden's debate performance fomented questions about his mental acuity.

title: Who is the Senate parliamentarian that some Republicans want fired?
shortDescription: Republicans want Senate Parliamentarian Elizabeth MacDonough to be fired over her ruling on Medicaid. Democrats have been mad at her before too.

title: NYC Mayor Adams announces reelection campaign
shortDescription: New York City Mayor Eric Adams announced his reelection campaign days after the Democratic primary.

title: Trump Mobile drops 'made in America' tag from new smartphone
shortDescription: The Trump Organization’s recently launched cellular service, the Trump Mobile wireless carrier, is defending its claims that its T1 cellphones are made in the U.S.

title: Current student loan borrowers spared from Trump GOP tax bill
shortDescription: The Senate parliamentarian struck down several key provisions in President Donald Trump's major tax and spending bill.
